solution.text:
Given
$\mathrm{H}_2(\mathrm{g})+\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{O}_2(g) \longrightarrow \mathrm{H}_2 \mathrm{O}(l)$;
$\Delta \mathrm{H}^{\circ}=-285.9 \mathrm{~kJ} \mathrm{~mol}^{-1} \quad \dots(1)$
$\mathrm{H}_2(\mathrm{g})+\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{O}_2(g) \longrightarrow \mathrm{H}_2 \mathrm{O}(g)$;
$\Delta \mathrm{H}^{\circ}=-241.8 \mathrm{~kJ} \mathrm{~mol}^{-1} \quad \dots(2)$
We have to calculate
$\mathrm{H}_2 \mathrm{O}(l) \longrightarrow \mathrm{H}_2 \mathrm{O}(\mathrm{g}) ; \Delta \mathrm{H}^{\circ}=\text { ? }$
On substracting eqn. $(2)$ from eqn. $(1)$ we get
$\mathrm{H}_2 \mathrm{O}(l) \longrightarrow \mathrm{H}_2 \mathrm{O}(\mathrm{g})$;
$\Delta \mathrm{H}^{\circ}=-241.8-(-285.9)$
$=44.1 \mathrm{~kJ} \mathrm{~mol}^{-1}$
